text: eteke tomaloke sihamtaka hatya karaa nachila baram allahe'i sihamtaka hatya karaichila. Yetiya tumi niksepa karaichila tetiya tumi niksepa karaa nachila baram allahe'i niksepa karaichila, arau e'ito muminasakalaka allahara taraphara paraa uttamaraupe paraiksara (madhyamata ucca maryadata upanita karaara) babe, niscaya allaha sarbasraota, sarbajna
